::Blazer::

Blazer frowns, recieving Sky Knight's transmission. He didn't like the idea 
of taking Berserk to somewhere populated, but Berserk was probably as ready 
as he was ever going to be.

"Allright," Blazer says, "If anything goes out of controll, report 
immediately."
